concept.title: Sheet sets panel
concept.shortdesc: The Sheet Sets panel offers a central location to create and manage sheet sets.

section.title: New sheet set…
section.p: Opens the Create New Sheet Set dialog box.

section.title: Open sheet set…
section.p: Opens the Select a Sheet Set File dialog box.

section.title: Import from XML…
section.p: Allows you to import an XML file that was created in BricsCAD with Export to XML.... Opens the Import Sheet Set dialog box.

section.title: Export to XML…
section.p: Exports a sheet set in XML format. Opens the Export sheet set as dialog box.

section.title: Plot
section.p: Plots the currently selected sheet set(s), subset(s) or sheet(s).

section.title: Publish…
section.p: Publishes the currently selected sheet set(s), subset(s) or sheet(s). Opens the Publish dialog box.

section.title: eTransmit…
section.p: Launches the eTransmit command. The currently selected sheet set(s), subset(s) or sheet(s) are included in the eTransmit procedure. Opens the eTransmit dialog box.

section.title: Sheet selections sets…
section.p: Opens the Sheet selection sets dialog box.

section.title: Custom properties…
section.p: Allows you to add custom properties for sheet sets and sheets. Opens the Custom properties dialog box.

section.title: View categories
section.p: Expands and collapses the currently loaded sheet sets.

section.title: Sheet set options…
section.p: Opens the Sheet Sets options in the Settings dialog box.

section.title: Sheets
section.p: Displays the opened and created sheet sets.

section.title: Sheet properties
section.p: Displays the properties and variables of the selected sheet set, subset or sheet.

section.title: Sheet preview
section.p: Displays a thumbnail of the currently selected sheet set without opening it.
